revised_title: Wave-length Determinations and General Results from a Detailed Examination of Spectra Photographed at the Solar Eclipse of January 22, 1898
tldr: The authors present their findings from a detailed examination of spectra photographed during the solar eclipse of January 22, 1898. They discuss the methods used for measuring the wavelengths and the results obtained, including the identification of Fraunhofer lines and the determination of the dispersion of the spectra.
